name: @junctionrelay/shader-noir
description: Hard-boiled film noir â€” bleach bypass, venetian blinds, rain on glass, coarse grain, cigarette burn

junctionrelay.description: 1950s crime film aesthetic. Near-monochrome bleach bypass grade with hard S-curve, venetian blind shadow bands at a slight angle, rain streaks and lens-distorting droplets on the glass, warm single key-light from stage left, coarse pushed-film grain, periodic cigarette burn flash in the top-right corner, and a sepia highlight tint. Fully self-contained.
